title: Shehnaz Gill Boyfriend:Dalljiet Kaur Calls Shehnaz Gill's Love Angle With Paras 'Fake', Says He Has A Boyfriend Outside Bigg Boss 13 House
text:
It’s all about the connections in this season of Bigg Boss! That’s what decides who will be nominated and who will not be. And so, the love game inside Bigg Boss 13 house has begun already.

Voot

The most popular love triangle as of now is of Paras Chhabra, Shehnaz Gill and Mahira Sharma. We know that Paras has a girlfriend outside of the house. But then, in one of the episodes, he also said that things between them both haven’t been smooth-sailing.

Youtube

And we all always thought that Shehnaz Gill was a bit serious for him, right? After all, she asked him before the last eviction that if she goes out in the evictions, how she should contact him.

Don't Miss 3.7 K SHARES 217 SHARES 405 SHARES 9.5 K SHARES 1.1 K SHARES

Voot

But looks like, there’s more to this story. Shehnaz Gill apparently has a boyfriend outside of the Bigg Boss 13 house, revealed first evicted contestant Dalljiet Kaur.

“Well, the whole love triangle and love happening in such a short time didn’t work for me because I could see that it was all fake. It’s a reality show but nothing is real. Within a week, I saw people falling in love, then forming a love triangle, and soon there was a break-up,” Dalljiet was quoted by Firstpost.

Voot

“All the planning and plotting was already done. There’s the winner of Splitsvilla, then another contestant faking love despite having a boyfriend outside the house. I don’t know how to say, ‘I love you, or look into my eyes…’ I can do all that as a character for my show but as Dalljiet, I didn’t want to, and Salman too told me that I played with dignity,” she added.

This a bit shocking, isn’t it? How far in the game will Shehnaaz and Paras go with this love triangle? Only time will tell.
description: Shehnaz Gill apparently has a boyfriend outside of the Bigg Boss 13 house, revealed first evicted contestant Dalljiet Kaur. The most popular love triangle as of now is of Paras Chhabra, Shehnaz Gill and Mahira Sharma. We know that Paras has a girlfriend outside of the house. But then, in one of the episodes, he also said that things between them both haven’t been smooth-sailing.
